game.name: Mondial
game.description: Discover interesting facts about countries of the world by exploring a world map model that conforms to the metamodel below. As you progress through the levels of the game, more details of the map metamodel will be revealed to you. Use the Model Explorer to query the model with EOL and answer the questions on the right!

level.question: How many countries are there in the world?
level.hint: // We'll give you this one Country.all.size().println();
level.solution: // We'll give you this one Country.all.size().println();

level.description: To avoid confusion, each country has a unique name.
level.question: The name of how many countries starts with the letter "A"?

level.description: Let's play a bit more with names.
level.question: How many countries have names that start and end with the same letter?

level.description: Some countries are encompassed in more than one continents (for example Russia belongs both to Europe and to Asia).
level.question: How many countries belong to more than 1 continents?
How many countries belong (even partly) to Asia?
Which country has the fewest inhabitants?

level.description: Let's shift focus on areas now.
level.question: Which country occupies the smallest area?
Which is the most densely populated country?

level.description: Most countries have land borders with other countries.
level.question: How many countries do not have land borders with other countries?

level.description: Then there are some countries with many neighbours.
level.question: Which country has the largest number of neighbours?
